topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: Deploying the Keystone and Neutron Role Patches

body.p: Before launching the hlm generate command, deploy the patches to update the Keystone and Neutron roles on kenobi-node-configuration. You should have downloaded the patch files in the Prerequisites.

To apply the patches:
Copy the patch files to the ~/ directory.
Change to the ~/kenobi-node-configuration directory:cd ~/kenobi-node-configuration
Execute the following command to deploy the Keystone patch. patch -p1 < ../knc-keystone-role.patch
Execute the following command to deploy the Neutron patch: patch --binary -p1 < ../knc-neutron-role.patch
Execute the following command to integrate the patch into the installation environment:: hlm_prepare-env.sh
When the hlm generate command is executed, the updated roles will be used.

p.i: Return to installing the non-KVM region for the tahoe memphis or sacramento template.
